repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

summary.p:
A multi-text manuscript, entitled Cāstiram Aintu on its additional title page, containing several works on traditional medicine:
The Cuntara nūl ("Book of beauty"), text in 33 verses (U2).
The Rāmarēvar paṭcaṉi (enlisted on the title page as: "Irāmatēvar vētānta paṣṣiṉi"), appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition, which concers supernatural powers, practices related to magic and yoga, in 108 verses (U3).
The Rōmariṣi cuvāmi cūttiram aṉpatu ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 50", "50 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi") appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition in 51 vesres (U4)
The Rōmariṣi cuvāmiyar cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram – 14", "14 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi"), appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition on practices related with yoga, in 16 verses (U5).
The Rōmariṣi cuvāmi nūṟu cūṣtiram ("Urōmariṣi cūttiram - 100", "100 [Verses] of the Treatise of Rōmariṣi" ) appears to be a text of Tamil Siddha tradition related with alchemy and yoga (U6).

collation.desc: 9 folios = Cuntara nūl. Tamil foliation 1-9 (at several folios unblackened). The first folio is blank, except for the title and unblackened text written in the column in the left part of the folio (f[1]r). Initial part of the text is missing (f2r starts with the verse no 3). Folio 3v is unfinished - it ends with the verse no 8, while folio 4r starts with the final part of the verse 11.
9 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvāmi ruttiram a[i]ṉpatu. Tamil foliation {1}-9 (35-43).
6 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvamiyar cūṣttiram patiṉāṟu. Tamil foliation {1}-6 (44-49).
27 folios = Rōmariṣi cuvāmi nūṟu cūṣtiram". Tamil foliation {1}-27 (50-76).
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter-numerals on the left margin, Arabic numerals in pencil on the right margin.
supportDesc.condition: Very good state of preservation, in spite of bore holes caused by insects.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 135 (front cover, recto).
BnF bequest sticker DON N° (front cover, recto).

Left-marginal intertitles: mataṉa vaciyam (f2r); tampaṉa maiyi [mai] vaciyam (f3r); [kakaṉa (unblackened)] vaciyam (f4r); tampaṉa maiyi vaciyam (f5r); [mōkaṉa (unblackened)] vaciyam (f6r); tampaṉa vaciyam (f7r); [illegible mariginal heading (unblackened)] (f8r); tampaṉam vaciyam (f9r); [uccara ?ṉap pukai (unblackened)] (f18r); śrī ṟi āṭai cor [?] (f18v); kaṭuṅkāṉi (f19v); kāyaveṭṭ aṟāmal (f20r).

binding.p: Pinewood covers apparently fabricated in the BnF.

origin.origDate: Dated internally. U4: vicu paiṅkuṉi {mācam} 11 veḷḷikiḷamai cukiṟavāṟamum ammāvaciyu pūca naṭcekkiramum mīṉāḷciyuṅ kūṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉa ??? U5 : vicu {year?} paiṅc[k]uṉi {mācam ?} 15 vīyāḷakkiḷamai kuruvāra nāḷum rokṇi naṭcettiramum aṣṭṭamiyum cuṭiya cupayōka cupatiṉattil Dated to circa 1780 by Vinson (1867) and to 1780 Cabaton (1912).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 25, n0. 135..

Vinson, Julien (1868). Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 37, no. 135. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso, 1c = first column, 2c = second column, 3c = third column

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding and edited by Emmanuel FRANCIS.

seg.seg: tantimukattōṉ cataṅkaittāḷē kāppu cakalaporuḷāy nirainta tāyār kāppu munti uraittēṉ mutanūl aṉpatukkuḷ [aimpatukkuḷ] mūla mutt=tiṟikōṇa vāci vātam cuntaram pōl aṟivuṭaiya makkaḷukku tōṭu kuṟiyum iṭi nilamun tōṇun tōṇum intav urai patiṉāṟu coṉṉēṉ rōmariṣi nūlukk etira nūl oṉṟum illai t=tāṉe ~ 1 ~
